property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker This creature can"t attack players. Holy Field Awaken - At the start of your turn, flip this card. :Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Holy Field Ignore any effects that prevent your creatures that have "Blocker" from attacking. ( However, summoning sickness is not ignored. ) Triple breaker Release :Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature costs 1 more to summon for each of your shields. Whenever your opponent"s creatures attack you for the first time in a turn and you have no shields, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. If you have 10 or more shields, you win the game. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw, you may look at the top card of your deck after that draw. Awaken - At the start of your turn, if you have a cost 2, a cost 3, and a cost 4 creature in the battle zone, flip this card. :Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player summons a creature or casts a spell, you may draw a card. Triple breaker Release :Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 5 cards. Whenever you put other water creatures into the battle zone, this creature can"t be blocked that turn. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - At the start of your turn, name a card. Look at the bottom of your deck. If the named card is on the bottom of your deck, show that card to your opponent, shuffle your deck, and flip this creature to its higher cost side. Slayer :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature would battle, destroy the other creature instead. Triple breaker Release :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Choose 3 cards from it, and put the rest into your graveyard. Then, put the 3 chosen cards on the top of your deck in any order. Double breaker :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. Double breaker Awaken - When this creature wins a battle, flip this creature to its higher cost side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent"s creatures that has power 6000 or less. Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. Triple breaker Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by the effect of a water creature or water spell, he can"t choose this one. If this creature or any of your other creatures in the battle zone are returned to your hand from the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If a fire creature is revealed, you may put it into the battle zone.:Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or more creatures in the battle zone, flip this card. Double breaker :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Triple breaker Release :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, count the number of cards in your mana zone. You may put that many cards from the top of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Double breaker Mana Reburst:Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Whenever your creatures attack, name a card. Then, look at one of your shields. If that shield contains the named card, you may show it to your opponent and add that shield to your hand. If you do, put the top 2 cards of your deck to your shields face down. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Spark" in its name from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your shields face down. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker :Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Chain Cascade (When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are creatures that cost less than this creature, you may put them into the battle zone. Put the rest of the cards on top of your deck in any order.) :Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard any number of cards. For each card discarded, choose a creature in the battle zone that has "Blocker" and return it to its owner"s hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hell"s Soul Recall 4 (Whenever this creature attacks or uses this ability, you may put 4 cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, uses this ability) : Destroy one of your opponent"s creatures.Double breaker :Evil Soul

card.name: Azafaust, Supreme Lord of the End

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your (Kung Fu Soul) creatures may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can"t cost less than 1. Triple breaker Whenever this creature or your other Dragons are destroyed, destroy one of your opponent"s creatures that has the lowest power in the battle zone. :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, search your deck. You may take a creature that has Double Cross in its name from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 2 creatures in the battle zone. Those creatures battle. (They don"t tap to battle.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put another Wild Soul creature into the battle zone, untap all Wild Soul creatures in your mana zone. Triple breaker :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) Whenever one of your other creatures would battle your opponent"s creatures, you may tap this creature. If you do, this creature battles instead. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Holy Soul) creatures. Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, choose one of the following: Put one of your Holy Soul creatures from your hand into the battle zone. Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. :Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your shields. It can"t cost less than 1. If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets +4000 power and has "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, all your creatures in the battle zone that have "Holy Field" abilities get their ability until the end of your next turn. At the end of your turn, untap all your Holy Soul creatures in the battle zone. :Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker This creature can"t attack players. During your opponent"s turn, if your (Holy Soul) creatures would be returned to your hand from the battle zone, they stay in the battle zone instead. :Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker This creature can"t attack players. At the end of your turn, return any number of spells that cost 1 from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have 4 shields or less, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Magic Soul) creatures. Double breaker Whenever this creature or your other (Magic Soul) creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and returns it to his hand. :Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following.: Choose a castle fortifying a player"s shield and return it to its owner"s hand Choose one of your opponent"s cards in the battle zone that costs the same as or less than the number of Magic Soul creatures in your mana zone and return it to his hand. :Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other Holy Soul, Magic Soul, Evil Soul, Kung Fu Soul, Wild Soul, or Bloody Soul creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power. ( If a creature has more than 1 Soul ability it only gets +1000 power .) :Holy Soul:Magic Soul:Evil Soul:Kung Fu Soul:Wild Soul:Bloody Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Draw a card for each creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Evil Soul) creatures. When you put this creature into your graveyard from your deck, you may return this creature to your hand. Double breaker :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your other (Evil Soul) creatures are destroyed, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. :Evil Soul|

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker Whenever you put another non-evolution creature into the battle zone, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent"s creatures attack, destroy this creature. Then, destroy your opponent"s attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a number. Then, discard a card from your opponent"s hand at random. If the discarded card costs the same as the number you chose, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Kung Fu Soul) creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your (Kung Fu Soul) creatures. That creature gets +3000 power and "Double Breaker" until the end of the turn. :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker At the end of your turn, you may return one of your creatures in the battle zone to your hand. :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker During your turn, if this creature is tapped, whenever your opponent would put creatures into the battle zone, they are put into his graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may return one of your other (Kung Fu Soul) creatures in the battle zone to your hand. If you do, untap this creature. :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marshall Touch Destroy one of your opponent"s creatures that has "Blocker". :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, search your deck. For each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may take a creature that has the same name from your deck and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. If you lose Rock-Paper-Scissors, destroy all your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Wild Soul) creatures. Double breaker Each of your other (Wild Soul) creatures break an additional shield. :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: While battling, this creature gets +2000 power for each of your other (Wild Soul) creatures in the battle zone. Double breaker :Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. If this creature is tapped and has not been attacked during your opponent"s turn, your opponent"s creatures that could attack this creature can"t attack you. (They can"t attack you or your shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may summon creatures from your mana zone this turn.:Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and put into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and isn"t blocked, choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Then, flip this creature after the attack. Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, tap one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone. (Choose what you are attacking before you choose the creature you tap.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose one of your creatures in the battle zone, your other (Holy Soul) creatures can"t be chosen. (They can still be attacked or blocked.) Double breaker :Holy Soul
